categories.name: Sofa
categories.description: Explore our range of comfortable and stylish sofas, crafted with precision to suit every home and lifestyle.

products.name: Safiyah 77'' Corduroy Sofa
products.description: Design your home in style using this lifestyle upholstered sofa. Featuring a classic modern look, this sofa is great for creating an appearance that is relaxing and inviting.

products.name: Shonn 120.08'' Pillow Top Arm Modular Sofa
products.description: This FCH 305*141*85 chenille 3-seater with footstool double bag indoor modular sofa can provide ample seating when guests are over, perfect for a small space and easy to lay down on for a nap.

products.name: Brittany 81.5'' Vegan Leather Convertible Sofa
products.description: With its ribbed cushioned back, this sofa gives your body all the support you need to sit and relax for hours. The combination of curved armrests and slanted legs work together to provide a unique rounded look that stands out.

products.name: Edmundo 75'' Square Arm Sofa
products.description: This sofa's understated design makes it a versatile choice for a variety of styles. Easy assembly and no additional tool required.

products.name: Engelhardt 51.96'' Faux Leather Sofa
products.description: Accent any room in your house with the button tufting with its signature diamond button creating a soft, relaxed style look.
